summary: An elderly professor's ordered life spins dangerously out of control when he falls for a nightclub singer.
cast: Emil Jannings|Marlene Dietrich|Kurt Gerron|Rosa Valetti|Hans Albers|Reinhold Bernt|Károly Huszár|Die Weintraub Syncopators|Eduard von Winterstein|Hans Roth|Rolf Müller|Roland Varno|Carl Balhaus|Robert Klein-Lörk|Wilhelm Diegelmann|Gerhard Bienert|Ilse Fürstenberg|Friedrich Hollaender|Wolfgang Staudte
title: El ángel azul
